text: We now have 1 in 4 🇺🇸 adults with a 1st dose of #COVID19 #vaccine in. We cannot afford to  trip so close to the end zone. Please continue to #MaskUp while everyone gets vaccinated. Our choices RIGHT NOW will make or break our summer & fall. #ThisIsOurShot #ScienceWillWin https://t.co/cDssev4IRF
